All Classes

Class Description
AccountTypeRole
Enumerates the allowable account role types.
Administration
Class creates the administration page of the application GUI.
Asset
This class stores an asset, with a quantity, asset type and the organisational unit that owns the asset.
AssetTests  
AssetType
This class stores an asset type, with a name and description.
AssetTypeTests  
AssetTypeTestV2  
BaseObject
Superclass inherited by all Common package classes.
ButtonColumn
Implementing code from: https://tips4java.wordpress.com/2009/07/12/table-button-column/ and from: http://www.camick.com/java/source/ButtonColumn.java The ButtonColumn class provides a renderer and an editor that looks like a JButton.
BuySellAsset
Class creates the place order page of the application GUI.
Client
Class allows the client side of the application to connect to the server.
ClientServer
Class used to run the complete application.
ClientSettings
Class initialises the server settings in the RuntimeSettings class.
EditOrganisationalUnit
Class creates the edit organisational unit page of the application GUI.
EditTrade
Class creates the edit trade page of the application GUI.
Grey
Describes the grey colour used in the GUI.
GUI
Class initialises the client side GUI.
HibernateUtil
Contains methods for utilising Hibernate.
iGet
Interface implemented by the Common classes, contains the get() method.
iList
Interface implemented by the Common classes, contains the list() method.
Login
Class constructs and displays the login screen of the GUI.
Main
Class used to run the client side of the application.
Main
Class used to run the server side of the application.
MainCentre
Class creates the central panel of the application GUI.
MainLayout
Class creates the layout of the application GUI, consisting of a navigation sidebar, a header area and the central display area.
MainNorth
Class creates the north panel of the application GUI.
MainWest
Class creates the west panel of the application GUI.
MyAccount
Class constructs and displays the account screen for the logged in user.
NavigationHelper
Class contains method that handle the GUI navigation between pages.
NewAssetType
Class creates the new asset type page of the application GUI.
NewOrganisationalUnit
Class creates the new organisational unit page of the application GUI.
NewUser
Class creates the new user page of the application GUI.
Notification
Class handles notifications passed to the runtime settings.
OrganisationalUnit
Class creates the organisational unit page of the application GUI.
OrganisationalUnit
Class stores a organisational unit, with a name and quantity of available credits.
OrganisationalUnitTests  
OrganisationalUnitTestsV2  
PayloadRequest
Class is required for the client to send objects to the server.
PayloadResponse
Class is required for the server to send objects to the client.
RequestBaseObject
Super class inherited by PayloadRequest and PayloadResponse classes.
RequestPayloadType
Enumerates the allowable client-server request payload types.
RuntimeSettings
Class contains the global runtime settings for the program.
Server
Class acts as the server side thread of the application.
ServerSettings
Class initialises the server settings in the RuntimeSettings class.
SHA256HashHelper
Class contains the method used to generate hashed passwords.
Store
Class creates the store page of the application GUI
Toast
Modified code from https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/java-swing-creating-toast-message/
Trade
Class stores a trade, with a transaction type, an asset type, an asset quantity, a price per unit, a date of creation a transaction status and the organisational unit that created the trade.
TradeStatus
Enumerates the allowable trade statuses.
TradeTests  
TradeTransactionType
Enumerates the allowable trade types.
User
Class stores a user, with a username, a hashed password, an account role type, and an organisational unit the user belongs to.
UserTests  
UserTestsV2
